title: Hat (India), 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, mirror glass
Technique: plain cloth embroidered with silks and mirror glass
description: Round pointed hat with a shoulder cape. Dark blue silk with all-over closely-spaced formalized flower design in red, yellow, green and cream silks and round bits of mirror glass. Backed with heavy red cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hat (India), 19th century. Medium: silk, mirror glass
Technique: plain cloth embroidered with silks and mirror glass. 
1938-28-1
